channel.title: Owners/admins keep items on death?
channel.description: on my server admins/owners loose items on DEATH how could i make it to where they dont?

item.title: Owners/admins keep items on death?
item.dc:creator: @EALclan EALclan
item.description:
@EALclan wrote:

[quote=“wohuynia, post:14, topic:340938”][quote author=blitz ags link=topic=437331.msg3213917#msg3213917 date=1274539438]

|| playerRights != 2 || playerRights != 3

[/quote]
Enough with this, it’s not the problem.
Well as i look to my coding

inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];<-this make you heal after death deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; freezeTimer = 0; followingh = false; [/quote]
ty for saying that stuff doesnt matter…blah ffs this is so annoying…

Read full topic

blitz ags:

|| playerRights != 2 || playerRights != 3

Enough with this, it’s not the problem.
Well as i look to my coding

inPitsGame = false; PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1; AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; Chivalry = false; Piety = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];<-this make you heal after death deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; freezeTimer = 0; followingh = false;

item.title: Owners/admins keep items on death?
item.dc:creator: @EALclan EALclan
item.description:
@EALclan wrote:

[quote=“wohuynia, post:9, topic:340938”] if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && playerRights != 4 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 1500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied();
I think i have the same code, so the problem isn’t here but in that code where people lose items after death and in this code (that handles death, not item drops after death)
Get it???[/quote]
ohhh okay i get it but then where would i change the admins/owners dont loose items on death? please help!

Read full topic

item.title: Owners/admins keep items on death?
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

		if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && playerRights != 4 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 1500) {
		client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
		youdied();

I think i have the same code, so the problem isn’t here but in that code where people lose items after death and in this code (that handles death, not item drops after death)
Get it???

item.title: Owners/admins keep items on death?
item.dc:creator: @EALclan EALclan
item.description:
@EALclan wrote:

[quote=“wohuynia, post:7, topic:340938”][quote author=EALclan link=topic=437331.msg3213870#msg3213870 date=1274534974]

look for youdied(); and in the conditions above it add

&& playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3

So what’s the problem?? mod+ don’t loos items if they die?? ;D
i have this look,

	if (!IsInFightCave() && !inFunPk() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
	client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
	youdied();
	killmessage();
		killerz.pkPoints += 20;
	updateRequired = true;
	}

ADMINS ADN OWNERS STILL LOOSE ITEMS THO PLEASE HELP!

[/quote][/quote]

THE PROBLEM IS THAT OWNERS CAN SPAWN BUT NOT ATM AND ADMINS CAN SPAWN BUT NOT ATM… AND IF THEY ARE ABLE TO SPAWN I DONT WANT THEM DIEING AND RUININ ECONOMY SO THEREFOR I DONT WANT OWNERS/ADMINS TO BE aBLE TO DIE

Read full topic
